column5: I though everyone would get as much humour as I did in learning that the Great lakes had pirates. This all started as fishgreg (now renamed Dangeorous Dan Seavey his lessor known and dwarf brother) learnt about places as we travelled to LOTW Escanba is a really interesting place - I attach a link its very interesting reading.  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dan_Seavey  Enjoy and good fishing
Thanks for pointing out that the name change was not accurate. I have fixed it.
